summary:
this mod is ENB preset
use pure weather and Relighting Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#1e84cc][size=6]Prelude ENB [/size][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman]
[size=5]-Installation-[/size][/font]

1.If you are coming from a different ENB preset
Delete all old ENB preset file

2.copy all the files to your skyrim folder.

3.Edit skyrim ini file

SkyrimPrefs.ini
[Disply]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0

enblocal.ini
[MEMORY]
ReservedMemorySizeMb=64 ... (256,512,1024)
For video cards with 2GB or more VRAM, 512 is a good baseline. For less VRAM, 256 can work better.
VideoMemorySizeMb=0 ... change to your VRAM size. (512,1024,2048...)

4. play game!

[font=Times New Roman][size=5]-Required mod-[/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?]Pure Weather by [b]Laast[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609/?]Relighting Skyrim by [b]NovakDalton
[/b][/url]
[font=Times New Roman][size=5]-Recommend mod-[/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters by [b]Laast[/b][/url] v4.7
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29253/?]Remove Interior Fog V2 by [size=2][b]rgabriel15[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12454/?]Dark Dungeons for ENB by [b]mindflux[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures by [b]dDefinder[/b][/url][b] [/b]main＋darker blood_color(optional files)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light by [/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?][size=3]t[/size][size=2]ktk[/size][/url][size=2]　[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects by [b]BuzzDee84[/b][/url]　
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23352/?]Better embers by [b]Dragonborn77[/b][/url]
[url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499][size=2]Skyrim particle patch for ENB[/size][/url]
[color=#5ea2e5][size=2]
[/size][/color][font=Times New Roman][size=5]-Link-[/size][/font]
